summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6080 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Emerald Park Addition, being the alley between North 65th Street and North 66th Street from Dayton Avenue to Fremont Avenue; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 83576, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
